name: Natural Selection: The Game
description:
This little "game" was actually made as a project for science class during e-learning.

our teacher gave us a little assignment about natural selection, and gave us a lot of freedom for what we could do. I decided I wanted to make a video game for the project, so I asked her if I could, and she was like "frick yeah dude" (paraphrased). we only had a couple days for the project so if it looks unfinished that's why. 

I will probably update it when I feel like it to polish it up a little. so check back every once in a while for that I guess.

This is actually the first game I've ever publicly posted believe it or not. I hope to keep improving at coding and all that jazz.

all the assets in this game were made by me, kermit is owned by disney I guess 

(can disney sue me for this?)
